flounder.engine.implementation

Interface ICamera

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAudioListener

    public interface ICamera
extends IAudioListener
    This interface is used throughout the engine wherever the camera is involved, so that the engine doesn't rely at all on the camera's implementation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      float getFarPlane()

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init()
        Used to initialise the camera.

      • getNearPlane

        float getNearPlane()
        Returns:
        The distance of the near pane of the view frustum.

      • getFarPlane

        float getFarPlane()
        Returns:
        The distance of the view frustum's far plane.

      • getFOV

        float getFOV()
        Returns:
        The field of view angle for the view frustum.

      • update

        void update(Vector3f focusPosition,
            Vector3f focusRotation,
            boolean gamePaused)
        Checks inputs and carries out smooth camera movement. Should be called every frame.
        Parameters:
        focusPosition - The position of the object the camera focuses on.
        focusRotation - The rotation of the object the camera focuses on.
        gamePaused - Is the game currently paused? Used to pause inputs to camera while in menus.

      • getViewMatrix

        Matrix4f getViewMatrix()
        Returns:
        The view matrix created by the current camera position and rotation.

      • getViewFrustum

        Frustum getViewFrustum()
        Returns:
        The view frustum created by the current camera position and rotation.

      • getReflectionViewMatrix

        Matrix4f getReflectionViewMatrix(float planeHeight)
        Calculates the view matrix for the reflection pass, given the height of the water plane.
        Parameters:
        planeHeight - The height of the water.
        Returns:
        The view matrix to be used for the reflection renderObjects pass.

      • reflect

        void reflect(float waterHeight)
        Prepares the camera for the reflection renderObjects pass.
        Parameters:
        waterHeight - The height of the water to be reflected on.

      • getPosition

        Vector3f getPosition()
        Specified by:
        getPosition in interface IAudioListener
        Returns:
        The camera's 3D position in the world.

      • getPitch

        float getPitch()
        Returns:
        The camera's pitch (x rotation).

      • getYaw

        float getYaw()
        Returns:
        The camera's yaw (y rotation).

      • getRoll

        float getRoll()
        Returns:
        The camera's roll (z rotation).

      • getAimDistance

        float getAimDistance()
        Returns:
        The cameras aim distance at the terrain.
